title: [Large-Scale] Development and Application of Educational Videos for Home Care Management of Liver Transplant Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical terminology and foundational understanding of liver transplantation surgery
context.additional_context: Learners combine online video learning with offline practice using personal devices, and measure learning outcomes through project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can categorize and explain post-liver-transplant medication management procedures at home into three or more stages.
Learners can recognize five key side effects to monitor when taking immunosuppressants and practice appropriate response methods.
After watching a video on personal hygiene management for infection prevention, learners can perform the methods with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish a daily meal plan applying dietary adjustment guidelines and explain the principles of nutritional management.
Learners can identify three symptoms that require immediate contact with a medical institution when complications arise.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
